description:
The gang tries to sniff out a cyber criminal who`s brainwashing people through online videos.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Nagumo no Cyber Jikenbo / Kaitou no Method / Tantei Joshu no Kyuujitsu
Nagumo`s Cyber Case File / The Phantom Thief`s Method / A Detective Assistant`s Day Off
名雲のサイバー事件簿 / 怪盗のメソッド / 探偵助手の休日
